name: In the darkness...
description:
WARNING: DIFFICULT GAME AHEAD. PLAY AT YOU'RE OWN RISK!

Hello traveler. Do you want to escape this dark land? If so, you'll have to enter a dark maze. Be careful, the most horrid of monsters awaits you inside...

Quick note, shadows in this game are a little bit wonky, I used the experimental 2d lighting in Unity for this project, and so this is the best I could get it in the time that I had. Also, the game says that you can open up a map, that is false, it was a feature I didn't have time to implement. It was supposed to fill in as you progress.  If you get lost, here is a map of the maze. As this is the full map and will contain spoilers for the path ahead,  I highly recommend not using it though for the best experience,: https://ibb.co/gRtYnXd
